channel.title: I need a server - a very specific server
channel.description:
OK, here goes.
I need a server that's code-able (YES that's a word) but not too in-depth.
I need a server that starts out as just a blank server - I tried allstar-scape but that has loads of pre-defined stuff.
At the moment I use TestScape. For some reason it doesn't have a method to spawn objects. I need something that can.
Any suggestions? Any help would be appreciated.
[i]Mods, admins and anyone else who has any sort of power over me whatsoever, and possibly the ability to make me perish in a fiery hell - please move this if it's in the wrong parking spot.[/i]

item.title: I need a server - a very specific server
item.dc:creator: @Bingo324 Bingo324

OK, here goes.
